alternateName: A Dataset for Detecting Personal Protective Equipment in Workplace Environments

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the PPE_DATASET_YOLOv8 dataset

keywords: subject > people and society > law > government > public safety
name: PPE_DATASET_YOLOv8
description:
The PPE-Detection-YOLOv8 dataset is designed to train and evaluate models for detecting Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) in various workplace environments. Leveraging the power of YOLOv8, a state-of-the-art object detection algorithm, this dataset includes a wide range of images featuring workers wearing or not wearing essential safety gear, such as helmets, gloves, goggles, and vests. The dataset can be used for developing AI systems aimed at improving safety compliance and ensuring a safer work environment through real-time detection of safety equipment.

Key Features:

High-quality, annotated images of workers in diverse work settings.

Object-level annotations for different types of PPE.

Suitable for training YOLOv8 models for real-time detection tasks.

Aimed at improving workplace safety and automation of compliance monitoring.

This dataset is ideal for AI researchers, safety engineers, and developers working on safety applications in industrial, construction, and laboratory settings.
